Johnson n 1: English writer and lexicographer (1709-1784) [syn: {Samuel Johnson}, {Dr. Johnson}] 2: 36th President of the United States; was elected Vice President and succeeded Kennedy when Kennedy was assassinated (1908-1973) [syn: {Lyndon Johnson}, {Lyndon Baines Johnson}, {LBJ}, {President Johnson}, {President Lyndon Johnson}] 3: 17th President of the United States; was elected Vice President and succeeded Lincoln when Lincoln was assassinated; was impeached but acquitted by one vote (1808-1875) [syn: {Andrew Johnson}, {President Johnson}, {President Andrew Johnson}]
